title: NFHS-5: Indians are getting fatter - and it's a big problem
description: Obesity is spreading rapidly and experts warn of a health emergency unless it's tackled urgently.

title: Got a new rash? Monkeypox or something else?
description: Red bumps and lumps? Scabs or blisters? What are the signs to look for?

title: 'I found my dream job in retirement - marrying people'
description: Former teacher Amanda Wheal explains how she reinvented herself as a wedding celebrant.

title: 'I change how I look and talk to fit in at work'
description: Two-thirds of women of colour in UK workplaces say they change themselves to fit in, a report says.

title: Ros Atkins on... Russia's food war
description: The West has accused the Russian military of holding food supplies for millions around the world hostage.

title: England playing behind closed doors after ban is an 'embarrassment', says Gareth Southgate
description: England playing behind closed doors at home against Italy after crowd trouble is "an embarrassment", says boss Gareth Southgate.

title: Ukraine war: 'This is just the beginning, everything is still to come'
description: As Russian attacks intensify, Ukrainians are asking whether it's better to pay for a ceasefire with land - or lives.

title: BBC News channel apologises after Man Utd error goes viral
description: BBC issues an apology after the words 'Manchester United are rubbish' appeared on the rolling news ticker.

title: Joe Clarke expresses 'embarrassment and shame' over WhatsApp messages
description: Nottinghamshire batter Joe Clarke says he feels "embarrassment and shame" over his involvement in a WhatsApp group with rapist Alex Hepburn.

title: Ukraine war: Put values over profits, Nato chief tells countries
description: Jens Stoltenberg says the Ukraine war has highlighted the cost of trade with "authoritarian regimes".

title: Norfolk and Suffolk residents turn to social shops and pawnbrokers
description: A mother-of-three says she has had to sell belongings and use a social supermarket to get by.

title: Crossrail: London's Elizabeth line opens to passengers
description: After much anticipation, the Elizabeth line is now operational - more than three years late.

title: Vitality Blast: 2022 tournament gets under way on Wednesday
description: Kent Spitfires head coach Matt Walker challenges his side to become the first to win back-to-back T20 Blast titles.

title: Energy firms warn against extending windfall tax to renewables
description: Applying a windfall tax to renewable energy could threaten the government's energy strategy, sources say.

title: Energy price cap set to rise to £2,800 in October
description: Industry regulator Ofgem warns households that they should expect higher energy bills.

title: Kemarni Watson Darby: Mum and partner jailed after boy's murder
description: Kemarni Watson Darby's injuries were comparable to a car crash or fall from a great height.

title: Partygate: Insiders tell of packed No 10 lockdown parties
description: Staff describe bins overflowing with bottles, people sitting on each other's laps and colleagues sleeping in the office.

title: Kurt Zouma: West Ham defender pleads guilty to kicking and slapping cat
description: West Ham United defender Kurt Zouma admits kicking and slapping his pet cat in a video that also showed him saying "I swear I'll kill it".

title: French Open: Second seed Daniil Medvedev begins with comfortable win at Roland Garros
description: World number two Daniil Medvedev secures his place in the French Open second round with a comfortable straight-set win over Argentine Facundo Bagnis.

title: Could hydrogen ease Germany's reliance on Russian gas?
description: Why hydrogen might be one route for Germany to move away from dependence on Russian imports.

title: Fry-up breakfast costs 40p more than last year
description: Supermarket food prices are rising at the fastest pace since 2009, says research firm Kantar.

title: Why chicken is getting more and more expensive
description: We follow a chicken from farm to supermarket shelf to see how costs are building up at every stage.

title: Luc Besson: Rape case dismissed for French film director
description: The director of The Big Blue and Nikita was accused of repeatedly raping actress Sand Van Roy.

title: Llanfair school: Four children hit by bus in stable condition
description: The bus mounted a kerb, hit a group of primary school pupils, and crashed into metal fencing.

title: Elizabeth line: What is Crossrail and when does it open?
description: Three and half years late and at least £4bn over-budget, Crossrail is finally about to open.

title: Teenage girl traumatised after police strip-search, says mum
description: The teenager was handcuffed and had her underwear cut off in front of male officers, her mum says.

title: Afghanistan: UK's withdrawal a disaster, inquiry concludes
description: The way the UK left the country last year was a "betrayal" that "likely cost lives", an inquiry has found.

title: Jesse Lingard: West Ham enquire about Manchester United player
description: West Ham United make an enquiry about Jesse Lingard, whose Manchester United contract expires at the end of next month.

title: Wayne Couzens denies four counts of indecent exposure
description: The alleged offences are said to have taken place in the months before Sarah Everard's murder.

title: Mikaela Mayer v Alycia Baumgardner super-featherweight unification fight agreed
description: WBO and IBF champion Mikaela Mayer will meet WBC belt holder Alycia Baumgardner in a super-featherweight unification bout this year.

title: Wales: Cardiff's Oliver Denham called up with Nathan Broadhead out of play-off squad
description: Uncapped Cardiff City defender Oliver Denham is added to Wales' squad for the World Cup play-off and Nations League as Nathan Broadhead is forced out injured.

title: Nation asked to sing Sweet Caroline for the Queen
description: Neil Diamond's 53-year-old hit was chosen by listeners of Zoe Ball's Radio 2 Breakfast show.

title: The changing face of the North Sea oil industry
description: Some workers are still banking on a career in oil and gas, others are focusing on a greener future.

title: Man City win Premier League title: How English football changed Pep Guardiola
description: In winning four titles in five seasons, Pep Guardiola has transformed English football - but he has also evolved during that time, writes Guillem Balague.

title: Monday Night Club: How does Erik ten Hag fix Manchester United?
description: The Monday Night Club team of Chris Sutton, Rory Smith and Micah Richards discuss how new Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag might attempt to turn around the club.

title: Newspaper headlines: 'Fresh danger' for PM over Partygate photographs
description: Most papers lead on new pictures of Boris Johnson at an event in Downing Street during lockdown.

title: Bangor City: The pop star, the football club and the Mafia link
description: How false hopes and claims of missing millions have hurt a football-mad city.

title: 'Democratic' jackdaws use noise to make decisions
description: The birds take to the skies en masse after calling out their 'vote', scientists have discovered.

title: Ukraine war: Melitopol residents resist Russian occupation
description: Partisan groups are carrying out attacks on occupying forces in the south-eastern city of Melitopol.
